snippet: The secretary of the Army and its chief of staff cautioned that reducing ground forces below a certain point would require rethinking America’s defense strategy.
lead_paragraph: The secretary of the Army and its chief of staff cautioned that reducing ground forces below a certain point would require rethinking America’s defense strategy.

headline.main: Army Leaders Warn Against Shrinking Forces Too Much
headline.print_headline: Army Leaders Warn Against Shrinking Forces Too Much
headline.seo: Army Leaders Warn Against Excessive Troop Cuts
